abstract: The F.B.I. is investigating a $687 million payout by Olympus, which the Japanese company has described as a fee for advice on the takeover of a British company.
snippet: The F.B.I. is investigating a $687 million payout by Olympus, which the Japanese company has described as a fee for advice on the takeover of a British company.

headline.main: 2 Japanese Bankers at Heart of Olympus Fee Inquiry
headline.print_headline: 2 Japanese Bankers at Heart of Olympus Fee Inquiry
